snippet.title: Truckful - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Meet Rotti and get a peek at the story in this new trailer for Truckful, an upcoming action-adventure game. In Truckful, drive your pickup truck through seemingly peaceful countryside valleys, deliver much-needed goods to local townsfolk and unravel the small town mystery. Beware, the old forest is watching. Truckful will be available on PC.
